title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Mathematics Information Literacy Improvement Program Based on the I-LEARN Model

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of secondary mathematics curriculum and basic digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify credible mathematics-related materials from academic databases with 90% accuracy
Learners can apply a process to evaluate the credibility of information sources using three criteria (author credentials, publishing institution, and recency)
Learners can utilize a three-stage analytical framework to solve problems in mathematics education settings and produce reports based on collected information

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
